mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_idx, notice_subject, notice_content, notice_date, notice_readcount, notice_file) values(#{notice_idx}, #{notice_subject}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_date}, #{notice_readcount}, #{notice_file})
mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_idx desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_subject=#{notice_subject}, notice_content=#{notice_content} where notice_idx=#{notice_idx}
UPDATE notice SET notice_readcount=notice_readcount+1 WHERE notice_idx=#{notice_idx}
